name: Yarrr!
description:
Yarrr! is a little platformer powered by Godot and built for a school project. 

Some short levels and a Boss awaits you.

What will we do with a drunken sailor?

Controls Gamepad:

Xbox and Playstation gamepads are supported. 

Move: Left Stick or D-Pad

Jump: A

Slash: X

Throw your sword: B

Keyboard:

Move/Jump: WASD or arrow keys

Slash: J

Throw your sword:  K
